title: New Kog Maw OP as Flip
body: Up to 5.0 attacks per second!!! WTFlip was Riot thinking, just stick him in a middle of a teamfight and GG. Just imagine him with full build.....

replies.body: so I'm gona have to play champs like kat and hope I get fed nice riot nice
5 attacks a second. Even if you were super fed and almost had full build and you shunpod'd to kog he could most likely kill you before you used your ult ;/

>
> 5 attacks a second. Even if you were super fed and almost had full build and you shunpod'd to kog he could most likely kill you before you used your ult ;/

Rengar = killed in 0.2 seconds.
only if he is snow balling

> [{quoted}](name=snakeowen,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Zy1hkqwV,comment-id=0001000000000001,timestamp=2015-11-03T09:46:23.338+0000)
>
> only if he is snow balling

Not particularly he can do it easily if he just has farm and some items. Doesn't have to be snowballing as such.
Most of the time hes is fed and also thats just one, he will have to back out after that (unless super fed)

I dont think I've ever seen a rengar back out of anything.. ever..

or ever seen one that isn't fed tbh
Bronze Rengos :)

> [{quoted}](name=GCSBBlitzForever,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Zy1hkqwV,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-03T02:12:26.734+0000)
>
> Most of the time hes is fed and also thats just one, he will have to back out after that (unless super fed)

Rango never backs out!
you dont HAVE to do anything. you're going to instalock kat anyway since you only play flashy assassins
I have not played kat for 6 months ty
Did you forget that 40% damage reduction?  With that in mind he's only gonna be doing 20% more damage than without the skill (without taking on bit effects in mind)
So with Bortk he can kill someone by pressing 1 button.

He also is gonna have to be basically immobile if he wants to get off 5 atks per second, making him a sitting duck for any kind of cc/burst. They are effectively making him exactly what he is meant to be, living artillery
GG easy -_-

tbh it's not that op, it only does 10% more damage total than a kogmaw with 2.50 attackspeed, it only deals 55% damage + the drawback of not being able to even move, so not really that great if you think about it, it legit removes kiting and replaces it with 10% damage
5 atks per second at 60% damage btw
Graves is a lot lot lot lot worse. Also, pls don't complain about a champion's power if he literally just hit the PBE
I know things change when they hit the PBE but Riot said Kogs 5.0 attack Speed was permanent :)

When? And I honestly don't see it as being too bad, he literally does have to stand still to fire at that speed. And in my elo, no one's gonna pick for Kog'Maw if there's a Kog on their team, nor are they gonna peel, and being someone who loves playing assassins, it's all g.
good. now people can have a better understanding of kogs already strong late game power
2 Stronk
